
3 Domain and Api
======================
3.1 production environment
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
:Domain: https://openapi.hicoin.vip
:app_id: to be distribution
:rsa_wallet_pub: to be distribution

3.2 Test Environment 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
:Domain: http://awstestopenapi.hicoin.one/
:app_id: baaceb1e506e1b5d7d1f0a3b1622583b
:rsa_wallet_pub:

::

  

:rsa_third_prv:

::

  

Descriptionï¼š Rsa_third_prv applies the private key for the third party and is mainly used to encrypt the request parameter. In the case of a production environment, rsa_third_PRV is generated by the developer and the corresponding public key is then provided to the platform. In order to simplify the procedures of integration, a set of public and private keys of a third party is directly provided here for developers to quickly develop.
